item.title: Implement a simple application in Python full scratch without using a web framework.
item.description: #Introduction It’s now possible to easily develop web apps using web frameworks such as Django and Flask, but even if you only understand how to use the framework without understanding the roots, it is essentially meaningless. , I decided to understand the mechanism by implementing a simple blog application using only python’s built-in functions and standard library without using the web framework. #Create index page Since the web server returns (displays) something by accessing it from the web browser, the index page to be displayed first is created in html.
